title: Must I pray tahiyatul masjid if I come late & congregation has already started? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: if I come to the Masjid to pray though and I find that the congregation has started now I remember the prophet saying Allah Do not sit if you answer a message until you pray to rakas but they're praying the congregation of prophet of Allah what to do go ahead and join them so I pray with them foreign now I think to myself should I stand up and pray to Masjid greeting of the Masjid the answer is no these four rakas of Fort were the bigger picture that included in them the turac has which the prophet ordered us not to sit until we pray
